select.if: select count(*) from user AS A, patient AS B where A.team_id = B.team_id and A.user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) from user AS A, patient AS B, step.hospital AS C where C.admin_id = #{userId} and C.hospital_id = A.hospital_id and A.team_id = B.team_id
select count(*) from user AS A, patient AS B where A.team_id = B.team_id and A.user_id = #{userId} and B.create_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)

select count(*) from user AS A, patient AS B, step.hospital AS C where C.admin_id = #{userId} and C.hospital_id = A.hospital_id and A.team_id = B.team_id and B.create_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
select count(*) from patient AS B where B.create_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)

mapper.sql: select B.create_date, B.patient_id, sbp_target, dbp_target from (select max(create_date) as create_date, patient_id from followup group by patient_id) as A, followup as B where A.patient_id = B.patient_id and A.create_date = B.create_date

select.if: select count(distinct bprecord.patient_id) from bprecord, () as C, user AS D, patient AS E where DATE(bprecord.create_datetime) = CURDATE() and bprecord.patient_id = C.patient_id and (bprecord.dbp > C.dbp_target or bprecord.sbp > C.sbp_target) and bprecord.patient_id = E.patient_id and E.team_id = D.team_id and D.user_id = #{userId}

select count(distinct bprecord.patient_id) from bprecord, () as C, user AS D, patient AS E, hospital AS F where DATE(bprecord.create_datetime) = CURDATE() and bprecord.patient_id = C.patient_id and (bprecord.dbp > C.dbp_target or bprecord.sbp > C.sbp_target) and bprecord.patient_id = E.patient_id and F.admin_id = #{userId} and F.hospital_id = D.hospital_id and D.team_id = E.team_id

select count(distinct bprecord.patient_id) from bprecord, () as C where DATE(bprecord.create_datetime) = CURDATE() and bprecord.patient_id = C.patient_id and (bprecord.dbp > C.dbp_target or bprecord.sbp > C.sbp_target)

select count(distinct B.patient_id) from user AS A, patient AS B where A.team_id = B.team_id and A.user_id = #{userId} and B.create_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) and not exists(select bprecord_id from bprecord where bprecord.create_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY ) and B.patient_id = bprecord.patient_id)

select count(distinct B.patient_id) from user AS A, patient AS B, hospital AS C where C.admin_id = #{userId} and C.hospital_id = A.hospital_id and A.team_id = B.team_id and B.create_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) and not exists(select bprecord_id from bprecord where bprecord.create_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY ) and B.patient_id = bprecord.patient_id)

select count(distinct B.patient_id) from patient AS B where B.create_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) and not exists(select bprecord_id from bprecord where bprecord.create_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY ) and B.patient_id = bprecord.patient_id)

mapper.sql: select C.patient_id, concat(max(C.sbp), '/', max(C.dbp)) as latest_home_bp from ( select A.patient_id, A.sbp, A.dbp from bprecord AS A inner join (select max(create_datetime) as max_datetime, patient_id from bprecord group by patient_id) as B on A.create_datetime = B.max_datetime and A.patient_id = B.patient_id )AS C group by C.patient_id
mapper.select:
select distinct C.patient_id AS patientId, C.patient_name AS patientName, C.gender, C.age, D.latest_home_bp AS latestHomeBP, RIGHT(C.prc_id, 6) AS prcNoTailSix from ( select A.patient_id, A.patient_name, A.gender, A.age, A.prc_id from patient AS A, hospital AS B, user AS C where 1 and 1
and ( A.patient_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or A.phone_no like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or A.prc_id like concat('%',#{keyword}, '%') )
and create_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
and create_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) and not exists( select bprecord_id from bprecord AS B where B.create_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY ) and A.patient_id = B.patient_id )
and A.patient_id in ( select distinct bprecord.patient_id from bprecord, () as C where DATE(bprecord.create_datetime) = CURDATE() and bprecord.patient_id = C.patient_id and (bprecord.dbp > C.dbp_target or bprecord.sbp > C.sbp_target) )
and C.team_id = A.team_id and C.user_id = #{userId}
and B.admin_id = #{userId} and C.hospital_id = B.hospital_id and A.team_id = C.team_id
) AS C left join () as D using(patient_id)
select patient_id from patient where patient_name = #{patientName}

select C.riskfactorclass_id AS riskfactorclassId, case when counter is not null then counter else 0 end as num from riskfactorclass AS C left join ( select riskfactorclass_id, count(*) as counter from riskfactor_followup AS A, riskfactor AS B where A.riskfactor_id = B.riskfactor_id and A.checked and A.followup_id = #{followupId} group by riskfactorclass_id) AS D on C.riskfactorclass_id = D.riskfactorclass_id
